wikipedia_page.main: John Hollywood Millar Easdale (16 January 1919 – 4 May 1999) was Scottish footballer who played as a centre half. Easdale died in Ontario, Canada in May 1999 at the age of 80.

response: John Easdale (born September 20, 1961Birth of John Easdale  Accessed March 28, 2009 on the internet. in Wayne, New Jersey) is the lead singer and songwriter for the American band Dramarama.
